headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Taxi Work Rewards
content:
The cabbies of the Downtown Cab Co. are unsung heroes, navigating the Los Santos streets while drunk clubbers and anxious entrepreneurs crowd the backseat.

Continue getting an extra kickback for your efforts, with rewards and rare items, including the Downtown Cab Co. Revere Collar shirt, for safely dropping off passengers via Taxi Work through February 8.

Clothing rewards will be delivered to your wardrobe by February 17. GTA$ rewards will be delivered within 72 hours of completion.
